XIV.4.D.12.a
.
Clarifying Disputed Amounts
If the amount of money reported in theÂ IVM is disputed, either in whole or in part, during the verification process or during due process and that disputed amount will adversely affect the amount of VA benefits payable, further efforts should be undertaken to clarify the discrepancy.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
